name: Adfectus
description:
Adfectus is an arena game for 2 players to battle one another. Each player has a claque that supports them and helps them throughout the game.

To win the game a player has to best their opponent, but also please their crowd, which will only be satisfied with a good show.

WIP

This is still a work in progress, as such, the current demo offers only a simple best-out-of-3 mechanic where you battle a human player in a split-screen match. Two controllers are required.
